ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Sit-in- reconsidering
ygData.msgSnippet: Until you come up with a better idea, i d recommend still doing the sit-in. It is well known that it is occurring, so people if they are wise will avoid those
ygData.messageBody:
Until you come up with a better idea, i'd recommend still doing the sit-in.
It is well known that it is occurring, so people if they are wise will avoid
those areas during that time. If you actually know of a better way to get
Verant's attention, then do share... if not, well maybe the complaints of
people who are lagging out will help us all in getting Verant's attention...
maybe they will realize that if they actually listen to the players it can
save a lot of headaches for everyone.

Don't get me wrong, i don't want to cause problems for other players... but
I don't know a better way than the sit-in. When the rangers did it to try
to convince Verant to give them critical hits with bows, it worked. Verant
is supposed to be fixing the problems with feign death, I believe in this
patch. So things like this can work... and I am sorry if it adversely
affects other players for a few hours, but if that's what it takes to be
heard then so be it.

-Eachann Bronzeleaf,
-Cleric of Tunare who WILL be sitting in

-----Original Message-----
From: Heather Daley <blushn@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 10:57 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Sit-in- reconsidering


>From: "Heather Daley" <blushn@...>
>
>I have heard this very same thing about Fear, as well as, Hate. I play on
>Fennin Ro and it will become bogged down and very lagged if there are that
>many people and it WILL cause deaths. I for one was going to hate this
>friday evening, however we are all reconsidering our fun adventure due to
>this sit-in.
>Its bad enough already that Fennin is the most heavily populated servers as
>it is. I was in West Freeport as I previously stated when the Monk protest
>took place and Yes I almost died, I was soloing Guard Jendl, when I
realized
>I could not longer click icons or use hotkeys to cast any spells at all, I
>could not even sit down for pete's sake, thank god I could walk and
>turn...So I was able to zone out.
>I have already stated to you all how I feel about the sit-in so I won't go
>there again, but please think of all the other innocent people who just
want
>to have fun and play, who you have a potential to adversely effect with
this
>action.
>
>Bree Wyndsdale
>50th Cleric of Fennin Ro
>
>
